mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer (name, tel, weixin, address, email, userid, companyid, companyname, level, type) VALUES (#{name},#{tel},#{weixin}, #{address},#{email},#{userid},#{companyid},#{companyname},#{level},#{type})
mapper.select: SELECT id,name, tel, weixin, address, email, createtime, userid, companyid, companyname, level, type FROM t_customer WHERE id = #{id} and userid = #{userid}
SELECT id,name, tel, weixin, address, email, createtime, userid, companyid, companyname, level, type FROM t_customer WHERE companyid = #{id} and userid = #{userid}

select * from t_customer left join t_items on t_customer.id = t_items.customerid
left join t_sales on t_customer.id = t_sales.custmoerid WHERE t_customer.id = #{id} and t_customer.userid = #{userid}
